import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import './Home.css'; import Banner from './Banner' import Card from './Card' function Home() { const [house,setHouse]=useState() useEffect(()=>{ fetch('/houses') .then(resp=>resp.json()) .then((data)=>{ setHouse(data[0]) },[]) }) return (
{ {url.image} })} house_type="Marimba" description="Two Private Villas located along the shores of Chwaka Bay, each with spectacular views of the ocean. This incredible scenery, along with its own private pool & large deck is surrounded by a tropical lush garden and a shared walkway to the beach. The private Jetty extending into the ocean is shared by both villas and offer an ideal place to lounge or line fish during high tide." price="KSH 8000/night" />
) } export default Home
